title: Prayer Request for Jimmy Coyne’s Grandson After Walkout-Related Attack?
subtitle: According to a vague Facebook rumor, the grandson of a man named Jimmy Coyne was assaulted at school for refusing to participate in pro-gun control walkouts.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: "Jimmy Coyne's grandson" was assaulted for refusing to take part in March 2018 walkouts to protest lawmaker inaction over school shootings.
